item.description:
Andrei Usachev - avtor pesen, p'ess i detskich knig. Laureat premii Marshaka i Chukovskogo. K sozhaleniu net vremeni opisyvat' vsio o nem.

Contsert dlia detei po adresu: 50 Kearney Road, Needham, MA (Lukomori'e)

Tickets $12 in advance, $15 at the door.

Ticket info: concerts21@yahoo.com or 617-785-0217


Dop. informatzia o nem dlia tech, kto ne znaet:

http://publ.lib.ru/AR...

Speshite! Kolichestvo mest ogranicheno!
Katya

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Concert Andreia Usacheva - November 7, 2010, 2 pm, 50 Kearney Rd, Needham, MA
